fixes.name: Attendance%
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator =
    SUMX(
        'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)',
        IF(
            'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[Status] = "Present",
            1,
            0
        )
    )
VAR Denominator =
    COUNT('Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[AttendanceID])
RETURN
DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau SUM(IF [Status] = "Present" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) to a SUMX over the table to perform the row-level IF, mapped COUNT([AttendanceID]) to COUNT('Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[AttendanceID]), and used DIVIDE for safe division. All column references use the 'TableName'[Column] format.
